attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Rolf Harris is one of the most recognised and dearly loved entertainers in the UK. Although Australian by birth he has lived here for many decades and has brought joy to many generations. He is a talented artist, musician, presenter and all round entertainer. Rolf has been awarded the OBE, MBE and CBE and i firmly believe he deserves to become Sir Rolf at the earliest opportunity.

Rolf is 79 years old this year and is still going strong. He will perform at the Glastonbury Festival this year and that demonstrates how loved and enjoyed he is by people of all ages.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
